description: Try our easy to follow Ready To Roast Turkey With Spiced Lemon And Peppered Broccolini recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast turkey,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Ready To Roast Turkey With Spiced Lemon And Peppered Broccolini Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt ingham’s frozen turkey breast traditional ready to roast 1kg

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat conventional oven to 180°C (170°C fan forced).
Remove turkey from plastic packaging. DO NOT REMOVE FOIL.
Place product on rack in an oven proof dish with 1/2 cup water.
Cook for 1 hour 30 minutes from thawed or 2 hours from frozen.
40 minutes before turkey is cooked, remove foil, and baste with a small amount of cooking oil to allow self-basting and browning.
Remove turkey from oven and allow 10 minutes to rest before carving.
Wash & trim the 1-2cm off the ends of the broccolini.
Heat a large frying pan on high heat and add 1 tablespoon of olive oil.
Add the broccolini & 1/3 cup of water and cover with a lid & allow to cook for 1-2 minutes.
Remove the lid, allowing water to cook-off.
Add in the chilli flakes, garlic, salt & pepper, and sauté for a further 1-3 minutes.
Squeeze the pitted lemons over the Broccolini and serve.
